description: Old-School Developers Portfolio website - A simple static portfolio website running on Python's SimpleHTTPServer. The site displays information about two developers (John and Peter) and their projects, with a contact form section.
notes: This is a simple, static portfolio website with no backend functionality or API. The contact form is client-side only (handled by JavaScript, not submitted anywhere). SimpleHTTPServer supports directory traversal (/../ works), but this is a known characteristic of the server. No sensitive data, credentials, or exploitable functionality identified. No POST/OPTIONS method support (returns 501). The application is straightforward with minimal attack surface.
